solution_line_template: He had {initial_crates} crates and then gave out {crates_given_out} so he now has {initial_crates}-{crates_given_out} = <<{initial_crates}-{crates_given_out}={crates_after_giving_out}>>{crates_after_giving_out} crates left

He bought an additional {crates_bought_thursday} crates for a total of {crates_after_giving_out}+{crates_bought_thursday} = <<{crates_after_giving_out}+{crates_bought_thursday}={total_crates}>>{total_crates} crates
Each crate has {eggs_per_crate} eggs so he has {eggs_per_crate}*{total_crates} = <<{eggs_per_crate}*{total_crates}={total_eggs}>>{total_eggs} eggs
